getAccountBalance(address).notice: Get the balance of an account, without accounting for changes in the index.

getAccountIndex(address).notice: Gets the most recently cached index of an account.

getFinalSettlementEnabled().notice: Gets the status of whether final-settlement was initiated by the Admin.

getFunderContract().notice: Gets the current address of the funder contract.

getGlobalIndex().notice: Gets the most recently cached global index.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).notice: Gets the global operator status of an address.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).notice: Gets the local operator status of an operator for a particular account.

getMinCollateral().notice: Gets minimum collateralization ratio of the protocol.

getOracleContract().notice: Gets the current address of the price oracle contract.

getOraclePrice().notice: Gets the price returned by the oracle.

getTokenContract().notice: Gets the address of the ERC20 margin contract used for margin deposits.

hasAccountPermissions(address,address).notice: Gets whether an address has permissions to operate an account.
